name: wp-debug-toggler
author: Everlee Labs
description: Toggle WordPress debug settings (WP_DEBUG, WP_DEBUG_LOG, WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY) from Local

scripts.build: npx tsc src/main.ts --outDir lib --module commonjs --target es2015 --esModuleInterop && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.watch: npx tsc src/main.ts --outDir lib --module commonjs --target es2015 --esModuleInterop --watch & webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch
